name: Glitchcan Minigames Image Assets
description: Collection of all image assets from the glitchcan-minigam project

image.name: search_mill_interior.png
image.description: Female character in blue dress exploring interior of dilapidated mill with wooden beams and cobwebs

image.name: village_overview.png
image.description: Cartoon village scene with Tudor-style houses with orange thatched roofs and green countryside

image.name: roman_numerals.png
image.description: Close-up of carved Roman numerals on dark stone surface

image.name: peaceful_sunset.png
image.description: Stone cottage with orange thatched roof at sunset with purple sky and flower garden

image.name: old_mill.png
image.description: Traditional watermill with wooden wheel beside stream in forest setting

image.name: neighbor_gardening.png
image.description: Elderly woman in glasses with woman in lab coat standing in rose garden

image.name: mrs_gable_wary.png
image.description: Close-up portrait of elderly woman with gray hair and concerned expression

image.name: metal_door.png
image.description: Dark metal door with rivets set in stone wall

image.name: look_for_clues.png
image.description: Hand reaching toward dark metal door with rivets

image.name: inside_dilapidated_mill.png
image.description: Interior of abandoned mill with wooden beams and warm sunlight streaming through windows

image.name: hidden_inscription.png
image.description: Ancient carved inscription on dark stone with mysterious symbols and Roman numerals

image.name: elara_thinking.png
image.description: Young woman with brown hair in blue shirt sitting at desk with books and lamp

image.name: elara_searching_details.png
image.description: Hands feeling along dark metal surface looking for hidden details

image.name: elara_reading_inscription.png
image.description: Close-up of young woman's face next to carved stone inscription

image.name: elara_metal_door.png
image.description: Woman in blue shirt kneeling and examining stone wall next to metal door

image.name: elara_looking_for_clues.png
image.description: Young woman with dark hair placing hand on stone wall searching for clues

image.name: elara_cottage.png
image.description: Stone cottage with orange thatched roof in daylight with flower garden

image.name: elara_approaching_mill_day.png
image.description: Female character walking toward watermill through forest path during daytime

image.name: children_playing.png
image.description: Village scene with elderly women and young girl playing cricket in Tudor village square

image.name: IMG_0290.jpeg
image.description: 360-degree panoramic photograph transformed into 'tiny planet' effect showing urban architecture, bridges, and buildings warped into spherical distortion with blue sky visible around the edges

image.name: IMG_7048.PNG
image.description: Mobile app screenshot showing interactive story interface with forest scene featuring character approaching old mill, with story text about exploring nature and multiple choice buttons for different actions

image.name: 03F3BBED-CFD8-446A-AEA8-E17D9CF566F3.png
image.description: Nine armored robot characters arranged in a 3x3 grid on green background, each wearing metallic silver/bronze armor with visible faces showing different expressions from stern to menacing

image.name: 383B165C-8F26-44A8-96B2-2E62A9645BB6.png
image.description: Stylized isometric cityscape in warm orange sunset tones featuring modern skyscrapers, 'CANARY WHARF' text prominently displayed, with elevated transit trains and flying vehicles including buses navigating between buildings

image.name: 1F5FFF26-F815-478F-AD62-522CB011CDE5.png
image.description: Low-polygon 3D portrait of stern man with dark hair, angular facial features, wearing dark clothing against brown background with Latin inscription 'VIGINTI SECVNDIS AD COMPLENDVM' on yellow banner below

image.name: 49259C34-ED3E-43FD-AD0D-11F7CBF4E8B2.png
image.description: Aerial view of city buildings with a large bird rendered in vibrant rainbow psychedelic colors (yellow, orange, red, green, blue) appearing to perch on or fly over a tall concrete building, creating surreal digital art effect

image.name: 546ADC22-C6F0-4BA0-BA19-EFAE18E93E29.png
image.description: Six realistic 3D rendered robotic or cyborg soldiers arranged in 2x3 grid on green background, each figure wearing metallic armor and showing different facial expressions and head positions, with weathered human-like faces visible through helmets

image.name: 4CB33058-288A-4F93-BDBE-9CCCF4A0DCAA.png
image.description: Apocalyptic landscape painting with small silhouetted figure walking toward burning windmill, dominated by intense red and orange fire lighting, dark smoky sky, and shadowy foreground creating dramatic contrast

image.name: 37ECA225-5A36-4B04-AF40-4D11B78FE16C.png
image.description: Collage of aged paper documents including newspaper headlines about 'The League Returns', 'Traitors Spotted', handwritten notes, AD PORTAS text, and various clippings with mysterious references to societies and secret groups

image.name: 288390B8-E588-4CDE-AFA7-7612F0F9DF91.png
image.description: Isometric dungeon room with brown checkered stone floor, small character figure near glowing blue portal/doorway, surrounded by dark green jungle vines and vegetation, with key icon visible

image.name: color_map.jpg
image.description: Global Earth texture map showing continents and oceans in natural colors for 3D planet rendering

image.name: bump.jpg
image.description: Grayscale height map of Earth showing elevation data for 3D displacement mapping

image.name: spec_mask.jpg
image.description: Black and white specular map showing land and water surfaces for 3D material rendering

image.name: clouds.png
image.description: Grayscale cloud pattern texture map for atmospheric effects on 3D planet

image.name: C69EC766-9D12-4686-BD3D-B3F9AD356C41.png
image.description: Person with orange curly hair and glasses wearing dark futuristic power armor suit, standing in modern office environment with city skyline visible through windows

image.name: 1CD7A2F8-C207-4420-9C60-60C77DA70516.png
image.description: Six-panel comic strip featuring elderly character with gray hair and red nose teaching Toki Pona phrases: 'mi ken ala', 'sona ike lon', 'mi pilin ike', 'mi open e nasin sin', 'mi lukin e pona', 'jan pona li kama'

image.name: 3E17DDFA-7CA2-44B3-A852-A6A64C0A44BB.png
image.description: Isometric dungeon room labeled 'Hidden Shrine' with stone altar structure, glowing cyan waterfalls, blue gem scattered on checkered floor, surrounded by dark green vegetation

image.name: 12E67B94-4352-4F5F-BCA7-0DB27A471ED9.png
image.description: Isometric treasure room with massive pile of gold coins and blue gems, small character silhouette, red chest boxes, checkered stone floor, surrounded by dark green jungle atmosphere

image.name: 237A2C79-5EDE-407D-A699-B0A3CF1C4567.png
image.description: Isometric jungle temple scene with luminous cyan waterfall cascading down, character figure exploring checkered stone platform, scattered blue gems, lush tropical vegetation and mystical atmosphere

image.name: EA969AD0-24EE-4A5D-99F1-3A576217C355.png
image.description: Isometric medieval dungeon scene with stone bridge crossing dark water, torches providing warm orange lighting, character figure navigating the atmospheric underground passage

image.name: 590C2081-0A9F-42B5-9128-909E629BBAD0.png
image.description: Young woman with blonde 1960s hairstyle wearing Union Jack flag t-shirt, sitting on subway train with other passengers, vintage color photography style

image.name: B266C9A3-9402-4622-962E-129F6921D855.png
image.description: Isometric dungeon scene with golden snake-like creatures winding across checkered stone floor, warm orange torch lighting creating atmospheric shadows

image.name: F73167DB-36FF-4C78-8801-9F9CC68A3F89.png
image.description: Pastoral countryside scene with young girl in blue dress walking toward moss-covered watermill, rabbits in flowering meadow, large tree and peaceful rural landscape in painterly style

image.name: IMG_7049.PNG
image.description: Mobile app screenshot showing animated forest scene with character in blue dress approaching watermill through woodland path, featuring story interface with path selection options
